TextView.android:text: On Texas roads, oncoming drivers and drivers passing nearby will receive a warning message from their smartphone or sensor signal broadcast by a road worker, bicycle rider, or school bus driver/teacher for safe driving. When a driver witnesses a pothole, dead animal, debris (such as pieces of blown-out tires), unexpected accident, or non-recurring congestion, you can notify TxDOT of the road hazard and congestion using this app. The road hazards/congestion messages sent by drivers are visualized to TxDOTofficers. Then updated road hazards/congestion information is broadcast to drivers for safe driving. Road hazard data relayed to TxDOT can be used to quickly make efficient road maintenance plans.
